About *.cbr (and .cbz, .cbt and .cba) I just learned that if you rename them respectively .rar, .zip, .tar and .ace, you can open them like normal archives.

Just rename the files to .RAR, and you can open them.

Wow, a lot of angry people. Some people have never heard of .cbr files, so I get the confusion. It's a file type usually used for comic book viewing. For PC users you can use CDisplay and Mac users can get FFview to open and read through these. However, if these programs don't work for you or you prefer not to download them, or whatever reason, all you have to do is change the file extension type from .cbr to .rar or .zip, then just extract them and view normally.
